description: black and white image of two boys in foreground at center, one standing, one squatting; two figures sitting in background to L of archway; fountain at L with hill in background behind; buildings at center and R; unmounted; in plastic slip cover
markings: on verso, two stamps: one purple one blue
signed: on verso, in pencil: [the Piazza (underscored) 4 (circled)/ Alex Knighley Hon FRPS/ The High Hall/ Steelon/ W Reighley England] and [6/23(circled)]
title: The Piazza
